sentences: Bjørn Haga (7 April 1926 – 2010) was a Norwegian journalist.
He began his journalistic career in Nordlys from 1954 to 1959 and Fremtiden from 1959 to 1963. He was a sports journalist, and also wrote about jazz.
The Lund Commission found that Haga was subjected to secret surveillance by the Norwegian Police Security Service in 1968.
